languages.text: "Губернатор — не тассерианец. Только вот выглядит так, что он и понятия не имеет, что творится за пределами планеты".
languages.translation_comment: привязать каунтер FW_CorruptionClues к общению с Губером в FW_HideAndSeek_dialogue на эту тему + к кую, где скульптор говорит, что губер с другой планеты FW_Sculptor_dialogue
привязать каунтер FW_CorruptionClues к общению с Губером в FW_HideAndSeek_dialogue на эту тему + к кую, где скульптор говорит, что губер с другой планеты FW_Sculptor_dialogue

languages.text: "The governor is not Thasserian. And yet, he seems utterly clueless about what is happening outside this planet."
languages.original_text: "Губернатор — не тассерианец. Только вот выглядит так, что он и понятия не имеет, что творится за пределами планеты".

traits.locale_text: "The governor is not Thasserian. Yet he seems utterly clueless about what is happening beyond this planet."
"The governor is not Thasserian. Yet he seems utterly clueless about what is happening beyond this planet."
"The governor is not Thasserian. And yet, he seems utterly clueless about what is happening outside this planet."
"The governor is not Thasserian. And yet, he seems utterly clueless about what is happening outside this planet."
"The governor is not Thasserian. And yet, he seems utterly clueless about what is happening outside this planet."
"The governor is not Thasserian. And yet, he seems utterly clueless about what is happening outside this planet."

languages.text: "Der Gouverneur ist kein Thasserianer. Und doch scheint er vollkommen ahnungslos zu sein, was die Geschichte außerhalb dieses Planeten angeht."
languages.original_text: "The governor is not Thasserian. And yet, he seems utterly clueless about what is happening outside this planet."

traits.locale_text: "Der Gouverneur ist kein Thasserianer. Und doch scheint er vollkommen ahnungslos zu sein, was die Geschichte außerhalb dieses Planeten angeht."

languages.text: « Le gouverneur n'est pas originaire de Thassera, mais il semble totalement ignorant de ce qui se passe en dehors de sa planète. »
languages.original_text: "The governor is not Thasserian. And yet, he seems utterly clueless about what is happening outside this planet."

traits.locale_text: « Le gouverneur n'est pas originaire de Thassera, mais il semble totalement ignorant de ce qui se passe en dehors de sa planète. »

languages.text: 「総督はタッセーラ出身ではない。それにもかかわらず、この惑星の外で何が起きているのか、まるで知らないように見える」
languages.original_text: "The governor is not Thasserian. And yet, he seems utterly clueless about what is happening outside this planet."

traits.locale_text: 「総督はタッセーラ出身ではない。それにもかかわらず、この惑星の外で何が起きているのか、まるで知らないように見える」

languages.text: «El gobernador no es de Thassera, y sin embargo parece no saber nada de lo que sucede fuera del planeta».
languages.original_text: "The governor is not Thasserian. And yet, he seems utterly clueless about what is happening outside this planet."

traits.locale_text: «El gobernador no es de Thassera, y sin embargo parece no saber nada de lo que sucede fuera del planeta».

languages.text: “那个总督明明不是塔瑟拉人，但他所了解的一切，似乎都仅限于这颗行星。”
languages.original_text: "The governor is not Thasserian. And yet, he seems utterly clueless about what is happening outside this planet."

traits.locale_text: “那个总督明明不是塔瑟拉人，但他所了解的一切，似乎都仅限于这颗行星。”

languages.text: "Vali, Thasseralı olmamasına rağmen gezegenin dışında olan bitenden bihaber."
languages.original_text: "The governor is not Thasserian. And yet, he seems utterly clueless about what is happening outside this planet."

traits.locale_text: "Vali, Thasseralı değil ama gezegenin dışında olan bitenden bihaber."
